post.text:
Trump sobre Alicia Machado en 1996: "Miss Piggy"

Esta mañana dijo: "Aumentó mucho de peso... era un problema serio".

comment.author: Kathryn
comment.text: I wonder how much did Clintons campaign paid Alicia Machado to lie about Trump.

replies.author: Julia
replies.text: Well Donald Trump certainly did not pay her the 10% of royalties owed to her for making him and the pageant money !!! he is a con artist.

replies.author: Ashlyn
replies.text: And I wonder when the next dumb post will happen

replies.author: Ashlyn
replies.text: Its not working and neither are
